name: share-your-garmin-workout
description: Download and share your Garmin Connect workouts

scripts.minify: terser share-your-workout.js -o share-your-workout.min.js --compress --mangle && terser garmin-inject.js -o garmin-inject.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run minify

author: Filippo Pisano
